thread.section_title: Hotel Michelet Odeon - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Surprisingly cozy
thread.title_full: Surprisingly cozy - Review of Hotel Michelet Odeon, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Emanuela C
title: Surprisingly cozy
text: This hotel is rated only two stars but by it provides great accommodation. It's very conveniently located (5' walk from the RER stop Luxembourg and a little further from the Metro St Michel). My (superior) room was a real surprise: spacious, reasonably clean, silent, with a beautiful view overlooking Paris roofs. I say it was a surprise as the door was quite small and outdated, but the room was really very nice. Also the wifi connection was good and reliable. Breakfast is quite basic but complete. I cannot comment on the price because I was there on business and the room was paid by my host. Will consider this hotel again should I be in Paris another time.
